title: Three Baby Birds
subtle: Concept (fiction), 45 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 70L
description: When baby birds grow up, they don't just leave home-they fly! This story follows three baby birds from when they hatch to their first flight of freedom. The book is written in a text simplified for the youngest of readers and is accompanied by silly illustrations sure to delight them.
